summary: CPSC: "VINSIC USB TYPE C CAR CHARGER IT WAS CHARGING MY NEXUS 5X WITH A USB C-C CABLE, AND IT WAS CHARGING MY GIRLFRIEND'S SAMSUNG GALAXY S6 EDGE+ WITH A MICRO USB CABLE. AT SOME POINT I  NOTICED THAT MY PHONE WAS NO LONGER CHARGING SO I STOPPED USING THE CAR CHARGER. I TOOK THE UNIT APART AND NOTICED THAT THE SPRING ON THE CENTER TERMINAL HAD OVERHEATED TO  THE POINT THAT A FEW COILS OF THE SPRING WERE WELDED TO EACH OTHER AND THE SPRING HAD ACTUALLY MELTED AND FALLEN APART.  *BF  MELTED AND FALLEN APART. THE SPRING WASN'T BROKEN FROM MECHANICAL STRESS, IT MELTED. THERE IS A    UPDATED 06/30/2017*JS
